reviews.review_msg: I took Special Topics - Ethnographic Storytelling with Dara Culhane. Taking this class was such a riveting and thought-provoking experience. We learned how to apply ethnography to daily life- noticing and accessing the details of life as an ethnographic story. Very accessible outside of class, funny, & easy to talk to. Readings are interesting

Super fun class, it is about video games. But Bascom is passionate about the topic which is helpful, the games are okay to play but learning about them more academically is very interesting. Bascom is always ready to talk about other topics or questions you had and gives good feedback in the weekly reading responses. 10/10 would recommend
